'Transmission' is a science-fiction comedy-drama feature film written, directed,
shot, and edited by independent filmmaker Alex Kopel. The film was
screened at the 2010 Flagstaff Film Festival.

Based on the premise of an alien that crash-lands in Berkeley, California, to
inform humans that they will soon destroy the entire universe unless they change
their destructive ways, the film features the music of Igor Stravinsky's [[The
Firebird|Firebird]] symphony.
